name: HYPNOTIZED
description: Recreation of one of Vera Molnars artworks. Keeping it similar to the original but with additional changes. Looping it makes it more hypnotic. Hypnotizing you to like the upcoming art...

name: SKETCH-Y
description: A variation of the artwork by Vera Molnar. By deleting some vertex function calls and making other small changes - you get the look of doodly triangles. The deletion of the noLoop() gives it a sketchy (sketchy because that is what it looks like... but also because it's a pretty sketchy move to try to hypnotize someone) touch!

name: EGGS FROM A SPIDER
description: Another variation of the artwork by Vera Molnar. Some changes to the original code transformeded it to something totallt different and unrecognisable. For me it looks like egg sacs in a web - but for you, it may look like something else. Hopefully it does if you're afraid of spiders and everything that comes with them...

name: SUNSET WATER RIPPLES
description: A variation of Frieder Nakes artworks (work in progress...).

name: QR-CODE
description: A variation of Michael Nolls artworks - but make it a qr-code that changes when clicked (WARNING: Don't scan it - I can't guarantee your safety hihi)!
